  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    pFilter​(double[] data, int filterSize)
    initial constructor that initialises all the variables and creates an array to store filtered value.
    pFilter​(double[] data, int filterSize, int lo, int hi, double[] filtered)
    constructor used when using the recursive action so that the filtered data is preserved and a new array is not created every time.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void compute()
    compute override that checks whether to run the filter recursively or to divide the data until it can run it sequentially and combine the results to obtain the final output.
    double[] getRes()  
    static void main​(String[] args)
    main function that reads the input file, makes an input array and calls the forkjoin process which is timed then loops through the output array and writes it to a file.

    • compute

      protected void compute()
      compute override that checks whether to run the filter recursively or to divide the data until it can run it sequentially and combine the results to obtain the final output.
